hero.title: The First AI-Powered Digital Nutritionist
hero.subtitle: Your personalized nutrition companion designed to support your daily dietary journey with science-based guidance.
hero.description: Powered by advanced AI technology, nutriwell provides educational nutrition guidance based on scientific sources and proprietary databases.

items.title: Calculate Energy Needs
items.description: Determine your daily energy requirements (BMR and TDEE) with precision.

items.title: Nutrition Education
items.description: Learn about caloric deficit, metabolism, portions, and macronutrients.

items.title: Food Substitutions
items.description: Get help choosing food alternatives and reading nutrition labels.

items.title: Balanced Meal Ideas
items.description: Receive examples of balanced meals (not personalized meal plans).

items.title: Food Analysis
items.description: Analyze images of your fridge or grocery shopping for insights.

items.title: Health Conditions Support
items.description: Educational information for common conditions like diabetes and cholesterol.

product.title: Why choose NutriWell.ai?
product.description: Get personalized AI-powered nutrition guidance that adapts to your lifestyle and goals.
benefits: Support for various health conditions and goals

disclaimer.title: Important Note
disclaimer.content: All content is for educational purposes only and does not replace professional medical advice. Always consult healthcare professionals for personalized medical guidance.
